entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • OnPlatform does not work in Header of CollectionView #25124
  • [UITest] Enable Stepper Control so that it can work with Appium on all platforms #25120
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Crash on Windows When Setting "IsClippedToBounds = true" in Custom Layout. #25118
  • [WinUI] Chevron doesn't get TabBarTitleColor #25115
  • NullReferenceException when setting BarBackgroundColor for a NavigationPage #25114
  • [Android] Java.Lang.IllegalArgumentException: 'No view found for id 0x7f0900fd (com.twe.elon:id/labeled) for fragment NavigationRootManager_ElementBasedFragment{e99ccf3} (d735450b-8b7e-4e10-87d0-3b9a8251e4b3 id=0x7f0900fd)' #24774 #25113
  • Getting 403 when trying to download MAUI nightly #25112

Closed

  • CarouselView with Border flickers #18104
  • Remove excessive DataTemplateSelector Comments #25100
  • HasBackButton not removing back button #7604
  • Editor within Frame causes application freeze for Windows #10387

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Regression with iOS button resizing with text or image change #25122
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button, .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr9] Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #25121
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [Windows] Fix for the issue with Label text color when resetting from FormattedText. #25119
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label

Merged

  • Remove excessive DataTemplateSelector API comments #25105
    area-docs, t/housekeeping ♻︎, community ✨
  • Move all Bugzilla tests to subfolder #25111
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests

Updated

  • Debug slow controls device tests #25096
    do-not-merge
  • Disable TitleViewSetOnShellWorksAfterNavigation on Device Tests #25125
  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨
  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Try build arcade net9 #25085
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [iOS] Changed UIImageRenderingMode for buttons #25107
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #24990
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Fix DatePicker slow first render (#24929) #24948
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Improve TextToSpeech function by adding a speech rate parameter #24798
    community ✨
  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Winodws] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • Adding tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24944
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • First tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24943
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed NavigationPage TitleBar visibility issue when set to the parent page #25000
    area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • [Android] Encoding webview's source #24002
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • Fixed Button doesn't reset to "Normal" if scrolled quickly to the top in IOS #25084
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • Move TitleViewSetOnShellWorksAfterNavigation to Appium #25094
    area-testing
  • [Android] Input transparent for a content page #25104
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • Port all remaining Xamarin.UITest tests to Appium #24153
    area-testing
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨
  • [Android] - Fixed Flickering Issue When Toggling WebView Visibility #24753
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • [Windows] Fixed CollectionView with grouping fails to add items when a footer template is present or crashes when removing data. #24867
    community ✨
